observation: Spencer County, Indiana – Spencer County Economic Development  0 Become A Partner Contact Us Search Angle Down A line styled icon from Orion Icon Library. Skip to Content About About Us Staff + Board Key Partners Economic News Careers Events Select Spencer County Site Selection Target Industries Competitive Advantages Tax + Incentives Sites + Buildings Workforce Business Resources Start A Business Relocation Assistance Living Here Cost of Living Housing Childcare Education Healthcare Recreation Open Menu Close Menu Folder: Back Incentive Assistance Workforce Development Quick Links SELECT SPENCER COUNTY Our county creates a thriving environment for our local businesses’ success. Nestled along the Ohio River with direct access to I-64 & US Hwy 231, the ease of access to road, rail, and port infrastructure couldn’t be better. Families flourish here, too, with access to award-winning schools, fiber-optic internet, and a friendly community spirit. Spencer County Economic Development helps foster growth while traditional values of grit, determination, and hard-work fuel our workforce.
